data.title: How to get the cheapest tickets to X Ambassadors hometown concert in Ithaca, NY
data.meta_description: X Ambassadors will perform at the State Theatre of Ithaca in their hometown, Ithaca, NY, on June 1.
data.text:
Ithaca, NY natives X Ambassadors are returning to their hometown to perform at the State Theatre of Ithaca in Ithaca, NY on Saturday, June 1 (6/1/24) for their 2024 “Townies World Tour.” The concert starts at 7:00 p.m.

The alt-pop rock band, consisting of lead vocalist Sam Harris, keyboardist Casey Harris and drummer Adam Levin, is best known for their songs like “Renegades,” “Unsteady” and “Jungle.”

X Ambassadors kicked off the North American leg of their 2024 “Townies World Tour” on April 5 in Vancouver, BC. The tour is in support of their fourth studio album, “Townie,” which was released on April 5, 2024, and is largely dedicated to Harris’ experience growing up in Ithaca. The tour will conclude on June 22 in Mexico City, MX, so only a few shows remain.

Where to buy X Ambassadors tickets:

Tickets for X Ambassadors’ June 1 concert at the State Theatre of Ithaca in Ithaca, NY can be purchased through platforms like Vivid Seats, SubHub or SeatGeek.

Prices are noted at the time of publishing and are subject to change.

Vivid Seats: Starting at $47

StubHub: Starting at $43

SeatGeek: Starting at $46

Related: New dates added to Justin Timberlake’s 2024 ‘Forget Tomorrow World Tour’: How to get tickets

Who will be opening for X Ambassadors?

X Ambassadors will be joined by Canadian musical group New West and singer-songwriter Rowan Drake for the remaining tour dates.

What’s the setlist for the 2024 ‘Townies World Tour’?

According to past setlists on Setlist.fm, X Ambassadors will perform a 15-song set consisting of favorites like “Renegades,” “Unsteady, “Gorgeous” and more, as well as songs off their new album “Townies,” including “No Strings,” “Smoke of the Highway,” “Women’s Jeans,” “Happy Life” and more.

Where else is X Ambassadors playing?

May 31 - New York, NY - Irving Plaza (TICKETS)

June 1 - Ithaca, NY - State Theatre of Ithaca (TICKETS)

June 2 - Boston, MA - Paradise Rock Club (TICKETS)

June 4 - Washington, D.C. - 9:30 Club (TICKETS)

June 5 - Norfolk, VA - The Norva (TICKETS)

June 7 - Charlotte, NC - The Underground (TICKETS)

June 8 - Atlanta, GA - Buckhead Theatre (TICKETS)

June 9 - Nashville, TN - The Basement East (TICKETS)

June 11 - Dallas, TX - Granada Theater (TICKETS)

June 12 - Austin, TX - Mohawk (TICKETS)

June 14 - Phoenix, AZ - The Van Buren (TICKETS)

June 15 - Los Angeles, CA - The Fonda Theatre (TICKETS)

June 22 - Mexico City, Mexico - Foro Puebla (TICKETS)

Where to buy X Ambassadors’ new album ‘Townie’:

X Ambassadors’ new album, “Townie,” can be purchased on vinyl or CD from Walmart or Amazon.
